channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
“In a year that has been so improbable, the impossible has happened.” RIP. https://t.co/RSIaXY2O7t

Vin Scully was someone we gained, not someone we lost.

My favourite Vin Scully quote isn’t even a real Vin Scully quote. https://t.co/Vg2E8Wwhx3
item.source:markdown:
“In a year that has been so improbable, the impossible has happened.” RIP. https://t.co/RSIaXY2O7t
Vin Scully was someone we gained, not someone we lost.
My favourite Vin Scully quote isn’t even a real Vin Scully quote. https://t.co/Vg2E8Wwhx3

item.description: Toronto hasn’t changed one bit since then! https://t.co/G4xo9zjCqH
item.source:markdown: Toronto hasn’t changed one bit since then! https://t.co/G4xo9zjCqH

item.description: @Sean_YYZ I started one for my neighborhood association (a tour of the walkways between buildings) and I was floored by how much a joy it was to make.
item.source:markdown: @Sean_YYZ I started one for my neighborhood association (a tour of the walkways between buildings) and I was floored by how much a joy it was to make.

item.description: StoryMaps is among the best software I’ve ever seen. They’re easy to create (so that you can focus on making the content) and amazing to use. https://t.co/VwpASxBdXU
item.source:markdown: StoryMaps is among the best software I’ve ever seen. They’re easy to create (so that you can focus on making the content) and amazing to use. https://t.co/VwpASxBdXU

item.description: @toddsieling It’s funny that it’s never actually 100%. https://t.co/bxdPI8cMiF
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling It’s funny that it’s never actually 100%. https://t.co/bxdPI8cMiF

item.description:
The Amber Alert system can, and should, be improved.

For instance, when linking to a website in an Amber Alert, the website should be able to withstand a large and sudden traffic spike.

When the website does work, it shouldn’t show that there are no active alerts when there is an active alert. https://t.co/BlST6Vay8Y
item.source:markdown:
The Amber Alert system can, and should, be improved.
For instance, when linking to a website in an Amber Alert, the website should be able to withstand a large and sudden traffic spike.
When the website does work, it shouldn’t show that there are no active alerts when there is an active alert. https://t.co/BlST6Vay8Y

item.description: @PortmanDoe I like how the Wikipedia entry for it basically reads: “All of the American locations are replica castles. There is also a location in Toronto.”
item.source:markdown: @PortmanDoe I like how the Wikipedia entry for it basically reads: “All of the American locations are replica castles. There is also a location in Toronto.”

item.description: @PortmanDoe I attended it recently, and watched a bunch of behind-the-scenes videos afterwards, and it’s kind of amazing that they put them on daily, twice a day sometimes.
item.source:markdown: @PortmanDoe I attended it recently, and watched a bunch of behind-the-scenes videos afterwards, and it’s kind of amazing that they put them on daily, twice a day sometimes.
